name: automapper
description: Guidance for AutoMapper convention-based object mapping library. USE FOR: convention-based object-to-object mapping, Profile-based mapping configuration, flattening/unflattening, ProjectTo with EF Core IQueryable, reverse mapping, value resolvers, type converters. DO NOT USE FOR: compile-time source-generated mapping (use mapperly), manual mapping in performance-critical paths, mapping that involves complex business logic.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
